job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client seeking a Senior Data Analyst in Deerfield Beach, Florida (FL).

Responsibilities include:
  • Elicit, understand, interpret and represent business requirements for data, information delivery and analytics, data integration, metadata, training, service levels, data quality, and performance
  • Act as the conduit between the customer and technical teams to ensure requirements are understood
  • Understand source systems and its data models
  • Work with architects to translate requirements into technical specifications
  • Validate that data integration, data movement, and warehouse meets requirements and service-level agreements
  • Develop source to target mappings for data lineage
  • Analyze data to validate business domains and requirements
  • Conduct data profiling and ensure data quality requirements are accurate and complete
  • Act in an advisory capacity in data model reviews, architecture approach and solution design to ensure high quality deliverables
  • Coordinate prototype reviews
  • Partner with management and business units on innovative ways to successfully utilize data and related tools to advance business objectives
  • Provide technical guidance and mentoring to business and data analysts
  • Execute and promote data management strategy
  • Work with Quality Assurance teams in defining the QA strategy, test plans and use cases to validate data
  • Communicate planned and unplanned activities to appropriate parties as needed
REQUIREMENTS:
  • 7+ years of experience working as a BI analyst or data analyst leveraging BI tools in a centralized data warehouse environment
  • 5-7+ years hands-on experience working with SQL with an understanding of different data structures (flat files and RDMS)
  • 3+ years of experience with data modeling concepts and techniques
  • Proven experience on projects involving data integration, data warehousing, data cleansing and data conversion process and/or tools
  • Experience working with Cognos v.8.x or higher or similar BI tool
  • Working knowledge of project management principles, a plus
  • Well versed in data management concepts, data lifecycle and methodologies
  • Understands and demonstrates the company's core values of communication, consideration, cooperation, accountability and innovation
  • Solid understanding of technology concepts, trends, and capabilities
  • Knowledge of data integration and data warehousing concepts for advancing business insights and data driven decisions
  • Skillful at applying business and technical skills to drive innovation and performance improvement
  • Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build relationships within and between individuals and cross-functional teams
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills, leveraging both logic and creativity
  • Ability to understand the unique needs of the customer and translate to actionable results while delivering high quality outcomes
  • Ability to influence and motivate individuals and teams to drive mutually beneficial outcomes
  • Minimal travel as needed
Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
